ComicInfo.Summary:
MAD downloads all the latest ridiculous iPod crazes, dolls up some Barbie movie tie-ins and rounds up a posse of gay cowboys. MAD also seconds the opinion of Everybody Hates Chris, and finds it can't escape R. Kelly's Trapped in the Closet!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:08:24. [Issue ID 129297]
